text: thæcring di khadthun læw brrda phu thi kha luk «khxng phwk khea pheraa khwam ngo khela doy prascak khwam ru læa hı pen thi txng ham nı sing thi xallxh hı pen paccay b yangchiph kæ phwk khea thangni penkar xuplokn khwam thec hı kæ xallxh thæcring nan phwk khea hlng phid pi læ phwk khea mi khey di rabkha næana
